text: Myristica gillespieana is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to Fiji. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica gillespieana. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. Category:Endemic flora of Fiji gillespieana Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Myristica gillespieana
